category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ForciblyMakeDesignPrimary
preference.preference_description: Bypasses the write permission on Part Revisions for creating TC_Primary_Design_Representation relations between Part Revisions and Design Revisions. The default value is false. Please note that this preference applies only when PS-make-mature-design-primary handler is used to make a Design Revision primary through a Workflow Process.
